title: BulkColumnUpdateRequest
description: Bulk update request for updating column metadata (description, display name, tags, glossary terms) across entities. Supports two modes: 1) Search-based: provide columnName and filters to find and update all matching columns, 2) Explicit: provide specific list of column FQNs to update.

columnName.description: Column name to search for (exact match, case-sensitive). When provided, the system will search for all columns with this name and apply updates based on filters.

entityTypes.description: Filter by entity types (e.g., table, dashboardDataModel). If not provided, searches across all supported types.

displayName.description: Display Name to apply to all matching columns.

description.description: Description to apply to all matching columns.

tags.description: Tags and glossary terms to apply to all matching columns. Provide an empty array to remove all tags.

columnUpdates.description: Explicit list of column updates (alternative to search-based mode). Use this when you want to update specific columns by FQN.

dryRun.description: If true, performs a dry-run to preview which columns will be updated without actually making changes. Returns a list of columns that would be affected.

columnUpdate.description: Individual column update with FQN and metadata changes.

columnFQN.description: Fully qualified name of the column to update.

entityType.description: Type of entity containing the column (table or dashboardDataModel).

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this column name.

tags.description: Tags and glossary terms associated with the column. Provide an empty array to remove all tags.
